item.title: A Ranking of People Per Capita
item.description: A Ranking of People Per Capita Recently, I came across a tweet, which inspired me. This made me want to fact-check it. Are the United States and Brazil really comparable in terms of number of people per capita? This will require some investigation. I created a TypeScript script to generate the numbers, so here’s then entire ranking: Afghanistan - 1 person per capita Albania - 1 person per capita Algeria - 1 person per capita American Samoa - 1 person per capita Andorra - 1 person per capita Angola - 1 person per capita Anguilla - 1 person per capita Antarctica - 1 person per capita Antigua and Barbuda - 1 person per capita Argentina - 1 person per capita Armenia - 1 person per capita Aruba - 1 person per capita Australia - 1 person per capita Austria - 1 person per capita Azerbaijan - 1 person per capita Bahamas - 1 person per capita Bahrain - 1 person per capita Bangladesh - 1 person per capita Barbados -
